articles.content: FedEx Corp’s Canadian subsidiary and Innomar Strategies, a Canada-based unit of U.S. drug distributor AmerisourceBergen Corp said on Thursday they have started to distribute Moderna Inc’s Covid-19 va… [+408 chars]

articles.title: Hunting for 'Disease X' - CNN
articles.description: Humanity faces an unknown number of new viruses emerging from Africa's rainforests, according to the professor who helped discover Ebola. "We are now in a world where new pathogens will come out," he says. "And that's what constitutes a threat for humanity."
articles.content:
By Sam Kiley, Ingrid Formanek and Ivana Kottasová, CNNVideo by Alex Platt, CNN
